Title: Arctic Hayes Freezer Kit 8-28mm

Title: Arctic Hayes spray freezing jacket

Title: Rothenberger Rofrost Turbo 28 pipe freeze mach
Description: Supplying quick, reliable freezing of domestic pipes, Rothenberger Rofrost Turbo 28 is suitable for all pipe sizes, with alloy adapters for 8, 10, 12, 15 and 22mm as well as the master freeze clamp, which fits to 28mm pipe. Designed primarily to freeze copper, the Rofrost will also work on plastic composite, steel and stainless steel (1/4 - 11/4"), although freezing times will vary. A must for maintenance and repair work, this handy tool is designed with a master freeze clamp that sits flush to the wall, fitting behind standard clipped pipes. Each clamp is fitted with a temperature display, helping users to gauge a pipe's freeze status when in use.
category: Trade Essentials/Pipe Freezing Kits/Pipe Freezing Kits.csv -> Rothenberger Rofrost Turbo 28 pipe freeze mach

Title: Arctic Hayes Commercial electric freeze kit 8 - 42mm 240V
Description: A larger size kit for bigger jobs, the Arctic Hayes 8 - 42mm 240V electric freeze kit is ideal for the freezing of pipes in commercial settings. Helping to reduce the cost of jobs in facilities maintenance or social housing, this kit includes aluminium freeze heads suitable for direct fitting onto 28mm pipes along with reducers for 8 - 35mm diameter pipes. Fitted with an integral lay-flat carry handle, the freeze kit is easy to transport and the incorporated storage compartment gives easy access to reducers. This electric freeze kit is supplied with 200ml of freeze cream and two freeze towels.
